messages.content: samathapreethi wasn't notified about this message because they're in quiet mode.

Hello Samatha garu, 

Thanks for reaching out :) 
As a policy , we do not advice on any real estate investment. 

But we are trying to bridge the information gap so individuals can take more informed decisions in our map view feature. 

Example, we just added hmda app to understand zoning more easily, we soon will be adding all proposed roads, infrastructure etc so it becomes easy to understand and identify right opportunities. 

For more details , you can check out website at www.1acre.in

Hope this helps :)
